LOS   IIs 116 129 132 134 160 151  53 168 184 185 153 150 Armaments index  Weapons  Tanks  Vehicles  Aircraft  Ships and submarines  Ammu- nition  Powder   October 1943 November 1943 December 1943 January 1944 February 1944 March 1944  226 229 224 234 242 231 gly) 241 231 270 269 264 280 454 364 415 I61 133 122 116 142  I22 I9I 171 168 140 140 265 282 206 211 198 208 234 163 January 1943 162 169 154 126 172 190 215 166 176 February 1943 207 185 169 132 227 164 230 184 169 March 1943 216 216 210 168 205 233 239 185 200 April 1943 215 212 289 145 216 185 229 194 169 May 1943 232 235 465 144 211 207 245 205 191 June 1943 ; 340 I61 233 208 230 199 July 1943 2) 367 146 236 163 238 192 August 1943 328 129 228 158 245 189 September 1943 495 128 222 191 259 194 October 1943 454 133 237 I71 265 206 November 1943 364 122 216 168 282 211 December 1943 415 116 186 140 288 198 January 1944 438 142 232 I40 281 208 February 1944 3 460 122 186 170 303 234 March 1944 498 133 262 153 314 163 April 1944 527 121 285 127 302 254 May 1944 567 126 295 152 301 276 June 1944 580 133 321 107 307 2 276 July 1944 589 117 367 139 319 267 August 1944 558 116 308 323 182 September 1944 527 84 310 335 175 October 1944 516 79 255 321 205 November 1944 571 78 274 307 December 1944 598 63 2 263 178 January 1945 557 60 226 128 Armaments Shipsand Ammu- June 1943 2 238 340 161 July 1943 2 238 367 146 August 1943 240 328 129 wv 208 230 2; 199 163 238 192 v RP WB Ww N ve foe}  v  158 245 189 Tol 2D) 194 71 265 206  September 1943 260 495 128  iw) 's) Nw)  October 1943 269 454 133  vv  AN  168 282 211  wv  November 1943 264 364 122  lon  December 1943 280 415 116  January 1944 274 438 142 February 1944 2 284 460 22,  4  140 288 198 I40 281 208 170 Bho) 234 March 1944 301 498 133 153 314 163 April 1944 320 527 121 127 302 254 May 1944 337 567 126 § 152 301 276 June 1944 361 580 133 z 107 307 276 July 1944 E 589 L17 E 139 319 267 August 1944 558 116 ¢ I41 323 182  September 1944 527 84 184 335 175 October 19
